div.p: The results presented in this paper have been obtained with the financial support from the European Commission through the EU ArcRisk project on Arctic Health Risks: Impacts on health in the Arctic and Europe owing to climate- induced changes in contaminant cycling (FP7-ENV-2008 (226534)). The authors are thankful for this support. The authors would also like to express their appreciation to the ArcRisk project participants, for providing novel data to the project and for participating in useful discussions on the topic presented in this paper.
